70 // /**
71 // This constructor is a simple interface to the Task
72 // constructor, that adds the relative deadline
73 // parameter rdl.
74 // */
75 // RTTask(RandomVar* iat, Tick rdl, Tick ph = 0,
76 // const std::string &name = "", long qs = __LONG_MAX__,
77 // bool abort = true)
78 // :Task(iat, ph, name, qs), _rdl(rdl),
79 // deadEvt(this, abort)
80 // {
81 // _dl = 0;
82 // }
83 
84 // /**
85 // Used to build tasks with the Factory. The string
86 // must contain a set of comma separated values, in
87 // the same order as in the constructor:
88 
89 // - interarrival time, deadline, phase
90 
91 // the interarrival time can be 0 (no interarrival at
92 // all, so non-cyclic task), or it can be a string
93 // specification of a random variable (for example
94 // unif(10,20)). See RandomVar in MetaSim for more
95 // information.
96 
97 // Then a set of optional paramters can be given:
98 
99 // - name (a string), queuesize, abort (true/false)
100 
101 // Please take into account that at least 3 arguments
102 // of numerical type must be given!
103 
104 // Example:
105 
106 // - RTTask *p = RTTask::createInstance("unif(10,20),
107 // 10, 0, task1");
108 
109 // is the same as
110 
111 // - RTTask *p = new RTTask(new UniformVar(10,20),
112 // 10, 0, "task1");
113 // */
114 // static RTTask* createInstance(vector<string> &par)
115 // {
116 // RandomVar* i = NULL;
117 // if (strcmp(par[0].c_str(), "0")) i = parsevar(par[0]);

176  class PeriodicTask: public Task
177  {
178  Tick period;
179  public:
180  PeriodicTask(Tick iat)
181  : Task(new DeltaVar(iat), iat, 0, "",
182  1000), period(iat) {}
183 
184  PeriodicTask(Tick iat, Tick rdl, Tick ph = 0,
185  const std::string &name = "", long qs = 100)
186  : Task(new DeltaVar(iat), rdl, ph, name, qs), period(iat) {}
187 
188  inline Tick getPeriod() { return period; }
189 
190 
211  static PeriodicTask* createInstance(vector<string>& par)
212  {
213  Tick i = Tick(par[0]);
214  Tick d = Tick(par[1]);
215  Tick p = Tick(par[2]);
216  const char* n = "";
217  if (par.size() > 2) n = par[3].c_str();
218  long q = 100;
219  if (par.size() > 4) q = atoi(par[4].c_str());
220  bool a = true;
221  if (par.size() > 5 && !strcmp(par[5].c_str(), "false")) a = false;
222  return new PeriodicTask(i, d, p, n, q);
223  }
224  };
225
